questions.questionText: The modern atomic mass unit is based on...
questions.solutionText: Atomic mass is based on a relative scale and the mass of 12C(carbon twelve) is defined as 12 amu.
questions.hintText: I saw a Dog in my backyard.

questions.questionText: Who is known as father of Zoology?
questions.solutionText: Aristotle is recognized as the father of both biology and zoology due to his remarkable discoveries in this field.
questions.hintText: He discovered that dolphins and whales are mammals similar to humans.

questions.questionText: This is a process where a single cell divides into two identical daughter cells.
questions.solutionText: Mitosis is a process of nuclear division in eukaryotic cells.
questions.hintText: This stage is where PMAT occur.

questions.questionText: An object that has kinetic energy must be in...
questions.solutionText: The kinetic energy of an object is the energy that it possesses due to its motion.
questions.hintText: An example of this is moving.

questions.questionText: How many quarts are in a gallon?
What is the outer skeleton of organisms such as spiders and insects called?
questions.solutionText: An exoskeleton is a hard covering that supports and protects the bodies of some types of animals.
questions.hintText: It is referred to as the "Outside Skeleton".

questions.questionTexts: What is the cell where a virus reproduces called?
questions.solutionText: Rabies lyssavirus, formerly Rabies virus (RABV), is a neurotropic virusthat causes rabies in humans and animals.
questions.hintText: A microscopic parasite that can infect living organisms and cause disease.

questions.questionText: What is the sticky part of the pistil called?
questions.solutionText: The stigma is a specially adapted portion of the pistil modified for the reception of pollen.
questions.hintText: Its main function is to attract the pollen grains from the air with its sticky tip for reproduction to take place.

questions.questionText: Which chemical causes the burning taste sensation when eating chillies?
questions.solutionText: Capsaicin is an active component of chili peppers, which are plantsbelonging to the genus Capsicum.
questions.hintText: It is a chemical irritant for mammals, including humans.

questions.solutionText: Alessandro Giuseppe Antonio Anastasio Volta was the pioneer of electricity and power.
questions.hintText: Born on February 18, 1745, in the town of Como in Lombardy, Italy.
